lead_paragraph: Prosecutors say the men were aspiring terrorists, but defense lawyers question the defendants’ capability to carry out the plot.
snippet: Prosecutors say the men were aspiring terrorists, but defense lawyers question the defendants’ capability to carry out the plot.

headline.main: Lawyers Dispute Suspects’ Intent in J.F.K. Bomb Plot Trial
